results.title: Effect of simvastatin on left ventricular mass in hypercholesterolemic rabbits.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol
results.text_hl: However, the behavior of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic_Familial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D024741 @@@ventricular hypertrophy@@@ in hyperlipidemic animals is not well understood.
